channel.title: [REQ] Barbarian > Berserker Helm [REQ]
channel.description:
I open the berserker helm into datmaker, its just a head, same for all hats, so i put in some of the other model numbers in the ints and it comes up with different parts of the barbarian helm ;)
Im wondering if someone can re-create it, so that i can have it all in 1 piece and change colours with ease.
Its for my new custom game, Barbarian based, Already have devious armour ;), thats why its called arms of devious.
Thanks,
Callum.

item.title: [REQ] Barbarian > Berserker Helm [REQ]
item.dc:creator: @teh_noob_kid teh noob kid
item.description:
@teh_noob_kid wrote:

ok, basically mate, i need the berserker helm, or a barbarian styled helm with the horns. I need it so i can open into meta easily and re-colour for different types.

I got the Berserker into datmaker, but the man weild and lady weild just shows there head, like it does for all hats. I Also checked the Drop and Inv, thats right, but the weild is the main thing, then there was some free codes below that, and that had the parts for weild, but seperate, 1 code would be horns, 1 would be helmet.

So basically i need ints and the model that i can easily edit in 1 model file, not 5.

Heres the ints for beserker, ill show you what went wrong;

if(i == 3751){ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = [Ljava.lang.String;@18b697e; class8.aString170 = Berserker helm; class8.aByteArray178 = "This helmet is worn by berserkers.".getBytes(); class8.anIntArray156 = new int[0]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[0]; class8.anInt174 = 4276;//Inv & Ground - This works perfect, but i need the weild mostly obs. class8.anInt181 = 890; class8.anInt190 = 24; class8.anInt198 = 120; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 2; class8.anInt194 = 0; class8.anInt165 = 215;//Male Wield View - Male Head - Not Helm class8.anInt200 = 391;//Female Wield View - Women Head - Not helm class8.anInt188 = 4222; - This is the horns class8.anInt164 = 4230; - this is the head class8.anInt175 = 4210; - I think this is the head again class8.anInt197 = 4216; - And not sure what this is }

I put in the problem next to it

There we go, I hope it helps.

Thanks,

Callum.

P.S, if it is easier, please add modcallum@hotmail.com.

Read full topic
